mapper.select:
select t.*,t1.note checkResultName,t3.name userName from t_pss_check_material t left join t_pss_dict t1 on t.check_result = t1.code and t1.type = 'ykzt' left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.bill_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'djzt' left join t_pss_user t3 on t.opt_user = t3.user_id where 1=1
and t.material_name like "%"#{checkMaterialDto.materialName}"%"
and left(t.opt_time,10) between #{checkMaterialDto.beginTime} and #{checkMaterialDto.endTime}
order by t.id desc

select t.*,t1.note checkResultName,t3.name userName from t_pss_check_material t left join t_pss_dict t1 on t.check_result = t1.code and t1.type = 'ykzt' left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.bill_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'djzt' left join t_pss_user t3 on t.opt_user = t3.user_id where 1=1
and t.id = #{id}

select t.*,t1.note checkResultName,t3.name userName from t_pss_check_material t left join t_pss_dict t1 on t.check_result = t1.code and t1.type = 'ykzt' left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.bill_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'djzt' left join t_pss_user t3 on t.opt_user = t3.user_id where 1=1
and t.bill_code = #{billCode}
